properties.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Elkhead and Park Mountains
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 8:24AM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
A quick moving disturbance will bring a quick several inches of
snow to the high elevations of northern Colorado Monday. Light
snowfall is expected to continue through this evening. Brief
rates near 1 inch per hour are possible as the strongest showers
move over the area this morning and early afternoon. Favored
locations in the Elkhead, Park, and Flat Top Mountains above 8,000
feet could see up to an additional 6-8 inches by Tuesday morning.
Light snow will continue into Monday night before tapering off.
Lesser amounts of 1-3 inches are expected below 8,000 feet.
